title: Void Linux - An Independent Distro Doing Its Own Thing
description:
In this video, I'm going to take a brief look at the latest release of Void Linux, an independent distro that uses the runit init system and has its own unqiue package manager (xbps).

REFERENCED:
► https://voidlinux.org/
